Jen O'Hara Interiors

Lloyd Harbor, New York

47 Lloyd Lane

A fully renovated sanctuary on 2.35 private acres

Modern Living, Timeless Character

This quintessential Nantucket-style colonial has been thoughtfully reimagined for contemporary living while preserving its classic architectural heritage. Every detail reflects a commitment to quality craftsmanship and enduring design.

Set on 2.35 acres of beautifully landscaped grounds, the property offers complete privacy while remaining minutes from the village and Long Island Sound beaches.
